trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Register an App ID for your app</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Register an App ID for your app</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Create an explicit App ID (not a wildcard App ID) and for Bundle ID, use the exact Bundle ID that is in your Xcode quickstart project.
trans-unit.target: Create an explicit App ID (not a wildcard App ID) and for Bundle ID, use the exact Bundle ID that is in your Xcode quickstart project.

trans-unit.source: It is also crucial that you check the Push Notifications option.
trans-unit.target: It is also crucial that you check the Push Notifications option.

trans-unit.source: Next, <link><linkText>enable push notifications for the app</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Next, <link><linkText>enable push notifications for the app</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: You may create either a "Development" or "Distribution" SSL certificate (remember to select the corresponding option in the Azure portal later.)
trans-unit.target: You may create either a "Development" or "Distribution" SSL certificate (remember to select the corresponding option in the Azure portal later.)

trans-unit.source: Then, <link><linkText>verify that the app ID enables push notifications</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Then, <link><linkText>verify that the app ID enables push notifications</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Finally, <link><linkText>refresh the provisioning profiles in the Xcode quickstart project</linkText><title></title></link> and <link><linkText>verify that the provisioning profile was either created or regenerated to enable push notifications</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Finally, <link><linkText>refresh the provisioning profiles in the Xcode quickstart project</linkText><title></title></link> and <link><linkText>verify that the provisioning profile was either created or regenerated to enable push notifications</linkText><title></title></link>.
